post.body: you realize that this penchant you have means that you are first up against the wall when the revolution comes. right?

the stress of watching it momentarily drove me insane, plus i hate the name baba o'riley. :P
good thing you don't live in california then.
you can check out any time you like, but you can never leave.
i really enjoy the days when i get to do my job. this was one of those days.
